post:
Greetings,

WHMCS Guru specializes in WHMCS related hosting. We offer shared hosting plans starting at $15/month, dedicated strictly to your WHMCS hosting needs.
Still hosting your company site with your billing/support site? Shame on you! Take a look at our shared hosting plans below. With 5 locations to choose from, what can you possibly lose?
We'll even help you migrate over to us and make sure your site is fully functional!

Guru 1: [Order Now] - $15/month

3 gigs of disk space
Unmetered transfer
Litespeed
WHMCS Updates (upon approval, of course)
cPanel

Guru 2: [Order Now] - $25/month

6 gigs of disk space
Unmetered transfer
Litespeed
WHMCS Updates (upon approval, of course)
cPanel

Guru 3: [Order Now] - $35/month

12 gigs of disk space
Unmetered transfer
Litespeed
WHMCS Updates (upon approval, of course)
cPanel

Unlike many shared hosting providers, we don't put hundreds of accounts on our servers. We place a maximum of 15 accounts on our servers, which are fully SSD powered and ready to host your WHMCS billing site.
Don't see something you're looking for? Do contact us and let us know! We're always here to work something out, if it's reasonable.

Note:
Due to arrangements with some of our clients, these accounts may only be used for WHMCS script hosting only. This does not apply to our VPS offerings, however.
